mapper.sql: a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.no_send_signs AS "noSendSigns", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.modify_time AS "modifyTime", a.offset AS "offset", a.year AS "year"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_channel_send_date_cfg( channel_id, no_send_signs, create_time, modify_time, offset, year ) VALUES ( #{channelId}, #{noSendSigns}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{offset}, #{year} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_channel_send_date_cfg SET channel_id = #{channelId}, no_send_signs = #{noSendSigns}, create_time = #{createTime}, modify_time = #{modifyTime}, offset = #{offset}, year = #{year} WHERE id = #{id}
